title: Stable populations have even age distribution

content.question: Which of the following is the best description of a population that has a stable age distribution?

choices.label: A large population that is growing at a constant rate
A large population with a negative growth rate
A population that is in the early stages of logistic population growth
A growing population in which the proportions of individuals in the different age classes remain constant
A small population that has not yet achieved exponential growth

content.answer: A growing population in which the proportions of individuals in the different age classes remain constant

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
